Mangas.Title: Naruto

Characters.Name: Naruto
Characters.Personality: explosive, loud, simple minded, easy going, cheerful person
Characters.CharacterProgression: Naruto is scorned by the villagers for being the host of a Nine-Tails Demon but soon becomes a ninja under an experienced sensei and along with his team completes dangerous missions and saves the world a few times earning him the position of leader and raising the next generation.

Mangas.Description: The story is about Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village

Mangas.Title: Blue Spring Ride

Characters.Name: Futaba Yoshioka
Characters.Personality: strong-willed, stubborn, yet passionate and caring
Characters.CharacterProgression: Futaba is a high-school student who attempts to fit in with her female friends by acting 'unfeminine', due to a history of female classmates ostracizing her our of jealousy. However, when she sees Kou again she remembers her true self and decides to improve

Characters.Name: Kou Mabuchi
Characters.CharacterProgression: Kou, after his mother's death became more pessimistic and distanced himself from Futaba.As Kou became more honest with others including himself,he finally realizes that he doesn't need to hide his feelings anymore and pursues Futaba.

Mangas.Description: Ao Haru Ride follows Futaba as she searches for true love and friendship,all while trying her best to stay true to herself
